segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I’m worried he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she knows he’s taking a risk but doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and it’s spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the floor is slippery now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t notice how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR
